website_summaries.verdict: Specialty cleaner from a small, family-owned, American business, produced alongside Leather Honey Conditioner, to maintain leather, vinyl, and leather products.
pros: Popular product made in the U.S. by a small family business specializing in premium leather conditioner and cleaner
Formula is concentrated, with every 4 ounce bottle yielding a cost-efficient 32 ounces of cleaner
Works on leather, vinyl, and faux leather, whether in saddles and tack, car interiors, furniture, purses, belts, shoes, etc
cons: Over 80% of buyers who tried this cleaner were happy or even amazed
The other 20% were less than impressed with its stain-removing effects, or negative interaction with their leather item

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleaning product for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review on Amazon because I really want to share how great this product is! I'll keep it short and sweet. I bought this product because I've never seen so many positive reviews on an Amazon product before -- 5 stars with over 2000 reviews. I love white and cream leather but it's a pain to maintain. As you can see from my pictures, the product did wonders to it! Pictures shown is just my first time using it. I can't wait to use it a second time to get my items even brighter and restore it.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: This leather cleaner ruined my $1K jacket. I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: This leather cleaner ruined my $1K jacket. I tried removing a pen stain with it, instead it ate into the fabric and ruined its color. Photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Kalaveshi

customer_reviews.title: Nice magic trick!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, i had no idea what to expect after reading some of the negative reviews but man was I wrong! This stuff is GREAT! I will say that it helped watching a video on YouTube of the product in action. I actually took the advice from a YouTube video & purchased an empty 32oz squirt bottle from Target, filled it with water & then added the entire bottle of leather cleaner as directed. POOF! Stains are gone! The only thing that I regret not doing is taking a picture of the before. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bralyn J. Ladson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the positive reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so annoyed that I believed all of the good reviews. This stuff is a rip off! It comes in a tiny bottle and you have to dilute it in an entire cup of water. All it did was rub out the color of my beige pebbles leather purse, it did NOT clean it! Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DISCOLOR YOU LEATHER!!!!!!!!!!!!no
customer_reviews.text: Be careful this thing won’t remove the thing you want it to move. But it will remove you leather color!!!!!!this is not for you. It will discolor leather, and break your heart. It did mine.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Xiao

customer_reviews.title: Crap! Ruined my purse.
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my Tory Burch purse. Used exactly as directed tested on a small portion on the back and discolored and ruined my purse. They claim money back guarantee but cant return so that's false. So upset. That aside not sure how simply spraying on something is going to clean it....which per instructions is all it says while repeating use as directed. AND HOW WOULD THAT BE?
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Left Items Discolored
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product did not work as well for me as it did for everyone else in the comments. It left the color on my boots uneven and my $380 FRYE handbag has awful dark spots all over it. I was able to save the boots, not the bag.
customer_reviews.author: KCKCJ05

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions if using on something dyed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm reading these negative reviews by people who couldn't be bothered to follow directions. If you are using on something dyed like a jacket, purse or furniture test it in a spot you can't see first. Common sense would suggest that a dyed produce might streak or fade depending on how the leather was dyed. I've used it on 3 expensive Corbin motorcycle seats where they dye it properly because it's exposed to the elements and it made them look better than they did new. I've used them on my cars leather interior again treated properly because it's exposed to UV rays and it gave amazing results. It's a great product and so is the conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the results but I think the product is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in order to remove old paint splatters on a used leather holster I found. I diluted the product (I think the instructions say 2 tablespoons in a cup of water) and started rubbing. It took a little bit of elbow grease but it finally worked. I'm happy with the results but I think the product is too high priced (I won't buy it again). The bottle is very small (about the size of large aspirin bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Brian L. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great on denim stains, boots, and recliners!
customer_reviews.text: A friend came to me recently in distress. Her coach bag was covered in denim stains from the bluing of her jeans. I wiped her bag down about 5-6 times and now the stains are BARELY visible at all. Followed with the Leather Honey Conditioner. It also helped clean up my recliner and my husband's old pair of hiking boots! If you have leather items that you cherish, take care of them, with this! (Like the manufacturer says, always read care labels and spot test before use.) I attached pictures of the process: pic #1 shows the left side of the purse cleaned and the right side not. pic # 2 shows the bag after the cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: rachelncross

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product bleached out my husbands shoes. They honestly look awful now. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, If you value your leather furniture!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not safe for all leather!!!!!! Buyer beware! It has left two beautiful (and expensive) grass-green leather chairs streaked, even after 4 days of allowing it to sink into the leather. I am returning this priduct!
customer_reviews.author: Shrinkwrapped

customer_reviews.title: It really does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have white leather furniture and have been trying to get it clean for the last two years. My new jeans transferred on to it. I have tried so many different cleaners and soap, nothing got rid of it. I mixed this according to the directions. I sprayed it on and let it sit for a few seconds. I wiped in a circular motion and my sofa is clean! My husband was so impressed that he took it out to his car and cleaned the leather seats. It did an amazing job on both things I have tried it on. I will have to order the conditioner next.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Ill never find out if its any good
customer_reviews.text: Product unloaded in shipping all over everything else Thanks and amazon insists that I ship it back for replacement great !
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: This works very welll!!!  Very happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on our Natuzzi Red leather couch and ottoman after I used the cleaner. It brought so much life back to the leather I was impressed and very happy! Sorry I don't have a before picture, Also concealed most of the marks and scratches our bulldogs nails caused from climbing up. I had used ones from WalMart previously and after 24 hours it looked as if I hadn't done anything to them. But with these two products, quite a different story. Very happy to have found them. I appreciate the other reviews since I researched quite a bit before making a purchase. Thanks for taking the time.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene C

customer_reviews.title: FOLLOW DIRECTIONS
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU FOLLOW DIRECTIONS, IT DOESN'T NEED A WHOLE LOT WHEN APPLYING. HINT: PRE-HEAT THE OIL IN THE MICROWAVE BUT TEST A LOW TIME FIRST, CUZ IT WILL GET HOT!!!!!! WHEN APPLIED TO LIGHT COLORED LEATHER , IT WILL DARKEN ESPECIALLY A SHINY FINISH ON THE BOOT...READ THE DIRECTIONS...I DIDNT AND NOW HAVE A STAIN ON MY EEL SKIN BOOTS...IT HAS A GLOSSY FINISH....READ THE DIRECTIONS.......THIS APPLIES TO THE CONDITIONER ALSO....BUT IT IS A GOOD PRODUCT...
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff.. I can’t comment on lighter leather changes, but I used both the cleaner and conditioner with excellent results on our 10 year old dark brown sofa and loveseat. The cleaner removed a lot of grime as I went through five rags that were stained brown. I bought the 8 oz size and mixed in a spray bottle. The conditioner is called honey for good reason. It goes on thick and sticky but covers a lot of surface area. I bought the 16oz size but maybe used 20%. You must wait overnight for it to get absorbed. Make sure you wipe it off and go back three/four times to remove all conditioner. Highly recommend this cleaner/conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Logemann

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  No darkening really.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to use the product. We have brand new leather couch and due to the reviews about it darkening the leather, I was scared to try it. So I used it on my saddle. Not much darkening really. So I used it on my sofa. I am very pleased with this product. It makes the leather rich and supple. Big difference from the other leather products I used before.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my natural leather couch and wow! The results were amazing. This couch looks better than it did when I bought it new. Some reviews said the smell is bad, but it smells just like any other cleaner that doesn't have added fragrance. As soon as the solution dried, which took about 10 minutes, the smell was completely gone. I highly recommend this product if you have natural leather that you need cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Coffee

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: Honey leather is easy to use and can bring old leather back to life. I purchased a tampico brush on amazon to use with this product. Mix leather honey with water according to directions. Spray product onto leather and agitate with tampico or horsehair brush to work product into a lather. Once finished, wipe away excess with a clean microfiber towel. You will be impressed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Carter

customer_reviews.title: Do not use for delicate leathers
customer_reviews.text: This solution is too harsh for delicate leathers. It ruined my Napa leather wallet. It completely dehydrated the wallet and the conditioner did not hydrate it again even after multiple applications. I also used it on a leather motorcycle jacket (Much tougher leather) and it works just fine. So it seems to be good with tough leathers like furniture, car seats, clothing, shoes (there are reviews on YouTube for shoes) and maybe belts. Pros: -easy to mix -does leave any residues after application -32oz is good for many applications -dries fairly quickly. I sprayed the solution on a towel first then applied to the leather. Cons: -requires hard scrubbing for stubborn areas - not for delicate leathers
customer_reviews.author: K.Q.N.

customer_reviews.title: Wipes away dirty before your eyes!!!
customer_reviews.text: 3 years of not cleaning my leather seats! I have a dog who makes a mess of my car! I have never used a leather cleaner before this and will never use another brand!!! This was so easy to clean, barely any elbow grease needed! It just wiped away the dirty right before my eyes! I used a microfiber cloth and then followed it with the Honey Leather Conditioner! The picture speaks for itself this stuff is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective
customer_reviews.text: Used to clean bugs from leather motorcycle jacket. South Florida has plenty of bugs throughout the year so jacket had fair level of dried bug juice. Using a microfiber towel, I was able to get most off without using my fingernail to scrape. Product does a decent job of cleaning dead bug residue but this isn't the main feature of the product which is to remove the leather's waxy protective coating ( which it does with ease.) After cleaning, I applied leather honey as directed which restored the finish to as new or possibly even better than new condition.
customer_reviews.author: eric k

customer_reviews.title: Have a clean, empty spray bottle available
customer_reviews.text: This comes as a concentrate that must be properly mixed and diluted with water before it is used. That makes it more economical but also less convenient. Finding a suitable spray bottle of a nearly used up home product that I could clean out and utilize for applying this cleaner was an addition task to accomplish before first use. If you don't mind the inconveniences of mixing the concoction and filling a spray bottle, it did do a good job cleaning my leather couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jagman1

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Did a bunch of research and tried several products - this stuff beats them all. Quite literally brought an old leather chair back to life and has conditioned new leather seats an excellent suppleness. Would recommend to anyone and will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this leather cleaner for use on an older, leather loveseat, and I am incredibly pleased with the results. There had been a slight odor of mildew, which this product removed. The scent of this product is very mild, and left the loveseat simply smelling of clean leather, which is all that I could have hoped for. This product left no visible residue, and caused no discoloration. I followed up the cleaning with an application of Leather Honey Leather Conditioner, and I have a brand new loveseat in soft, clean, supple leather. I highly recommend this product, and I am not being compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great Products!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bundle: leather cleaner, conditioner, and cloth. I really loved how our leather sectional came out after I had finished it. The only downfall is that the conditioner is EXTREMELY hard to put on. It took me no less than 1 1/2 hours to get it on because it is thick (not like a lotion)...probably one of the reasons they use honey in the name of the product. You really have to put some muscle into applying, but it is worth it in the end:) I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: put life back in my near 40 year Ferrari seats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the leather honey cleaner and conditioner in hopes to hydrate the leather in my 1985 Ferrari. What a difference this product made. The leather was getting a little stiff and not as comfortable to sit on. After using the Leather honey product the leather start to relax a bit and soften too. It also did a nice deep cleaning of the leather and removed dirt and grim from deep in the leather. That in itself improved the look of the interior. Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Daron

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully, though may need several coats.
customer_reviews.text: Our leather couch from Restoration Hardware has lost its luster - very dried-out. Disappointing really. But Leather Honey has seemed to help restore the leather, nearly to its original state. After applying, we let it settle for a day, then reapplied again. We still need to do this process for this couch almost every other month. Extremely happy with the Leather Honey product... Not so much for this expensive Restoration Hardware couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and works well!!!  Great to support a family business with a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the ounce per 8 ounces of water. However, I wish the cleaner bottle was larger, like 8 ounce. I cleaned a vintage mule harness and 3 vintage bridles today. It was very easy to put on and I used it with lint free rags. I also decided to try the cleaner on a 2010 Honda Oddessey and it worked great on the leather seats. Letting everything dry overnight and plan on using the oil tomorrow. So far, very impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pruduct to see why it was too rated. I used the cleaner on my tan leather car seats. At first it cleaned all the dirt and stains off the seats, than I spray and wipe the seats 3 more times, but wasn’t happy with the results. Than I used a soft brush, sprayed and brushed off the imbedded dirt and stains within the grain. The results were incredible!!! I guess you just have to put in some elbow grease to achieve the results that you want. At the end, I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works where others do not
customer_reviews.text: I wear blue jeans and have beige colored leather seats in my car. I tried other products to remove the blue stains to no avail. Leather Honey cleaned the stains perfectly. I am very impressed with this product. I also have a light colored sofa that my dog loves. It cleaned the sofa to make it look brand new. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty F.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff lived up to its promises. I am so glad I got over my scepticism and gave it a try. My sofa, armchair and ottoman might not look new again, but they aren't dirty and scuffed up any more. I was on the verge of replacing them; if I continue cleaning and conditioning a couple of times a year I think I'll get another decade out of my furniture. I love it when a product works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a deep cleanser but works good as light cleaner with broad coverage via spray method
customer_reviews.text: It does not clean very well. Maybe ok as a light cleaner but definitely not deep cleansing. I used this as a direct competitor to Mothers Leather Wash and the Mothers product removed much more dirt than this Leather Honey Product. I was hoping Leather Honey would do a better job since it was concentrate and provided great coverage. If you consider it, do so with the expectation that it should be used to do minor spot cleaning or occasional wipe down of an already clean surface.
customer_reviews.author: NikNak

customer_reviews.title: Works miracles! Cleaned oil stain!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these boots on my recent trip to Italy and unfortunately had a bottle of olive oil burst in my luggage, taking one of the boots as it's victim. I tried corn starch, baking soda, dish detergent. None of them lifted the stain. This product did! I had to make a few passes with it (and still might make one or two more) but I am extremely happy with the result and would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Wade

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the whole set, cleaner, conditioner and the microfiber. It is not a good product and huge waste of money. I would not recommend it. It is hard to spread, doesn't even clean as well common wipes and the seats are super sticky after light application. I have a 2017, F150, platinum, FX4 and now I have a sand paper seat on my hand. I am just not sure how this company stayed in business for this long. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Al

customer_reviews.title: Efficient product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a used, top-name leather chair for my husband. It is the first leather piece we've owned, so I researched for several hours about how best to clean it. There are tons of opinions out there, but I decided to go with this product because of its longevity and solid reviews. I cleaned it several times because my cloth kept coming away dirty despite the fact the chair appeared to be clean. A few days later I followed with their conditioner. The products were easy to use, effective, mild on my hands, and did not have a strong odor. The chair looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Etown Moore

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: I would have honestly liked for this to work as advertised, but there was no difference whatsoever on my leather chair (dark spot at head level). I tried as explained. I had previously tried a Leather Honey Leather Conditioner as well, but no significant change on chair appearance even beyond the spot, with that product either. Refunds promptly issued.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for a miracle on leather, Coach, purses
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for older stains. I'm using it on older, leather, Coach purses. It's helping, but isn't ever going to be the same purse. Don't expect miracles with this product. It's better than nothing, but was hoping after reading all the reviews it would've done a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: i didn't notice a difference after using. I feel like coconut oil would have accomplished the same outcome and I would not have spent as much money. The bottles are very small. I used on my brown sofa and on a grey vehicle seat. Within a week the sofa looked just like it did prior to using the product.
customer_reviews.author: clothes horse

customer_reviews.title: Did not make a difference
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean water (Melted snow) and salt marks from my leather shoes. I repeated three times and brushed generously with a drill brush attachment (so not brushing enough was not an issue). It did nothing to make the shoes look any cleaner. The pic attached is after using the conditioner which works well but only if the leather is already clean. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Taxiarchis Kourelis

customer_reviews.title: My leather sofa looks new! Best leather cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: The headrest on my sofa was stained, I thought, from hair products. I thought that there was no fixing it. I tried different leather cleaners, which made it look worse. After looking on line and reading reviews, I ordered the Leather Honey. I’m so glad I did! It’s like brand new. The color did not fade, nor stain. It took about 15 minutes and it was completely restored. I loved it so much, I ordered the conditioner that goes with it. I will review that one as soon as I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Golfing Nana

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Went to clean 2 jackets, used this stuff as directed, but did not appear to work that well. So I got some warm water and a few drops of Dawn, which removed much, much more dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Determine why you need this before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews. .used it...read more about directions. ..Didn't get results. .won't help worn dirty leather
customer_reviews.author: Jn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: With my dog joining me on my light gray leather sofa, there was quite a bit of dirty leather to contend with. This stuff is absolutely amazing! I didn’t have to rub hard. Just follow directions and clean the couch quite easily. I will definitely buy more when I use up this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle for price; good product
customer_reviews.text: Small bottle for the price and half of it went into my spray bottle to be diluted. Seems to be going a long ways though. I just bought a new leather sectional and wanted to take extra care of it to help it last. This product smells good and seems to make the leather shine. I have no complaints on how well it is working!
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner for leather furniture
customer_reviews.text: 1st time cleaning my leather sofa and 2 recliners. Super easy instructions. I can’t believe how filthy the water was. We’ve only had this furniture for 3 months. Wish I had bought 2 bottles though, as the 1 bottle won’t go very far if you have a full sofa and love seat or 2 recliners. I will likely finish almost the entire bottle after my second application to make sure they are clean. Smells pleasant - definitely a “clean” smell that reminds me of the car wash. I only wish they had it in a pine scent!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda D

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my saddle colored purse.
customer_reviews.text: I had a few tiny water drop spots on a leather purse That I wanted to treat. I bought the cleaner and conditioner. I followed usage directions, even did a test door in the inside. But unfortunately I had a spot that was lightened on my purse now. It’s not too noticeable but worse than the original tiny water spot.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Leather duller!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! This product discolored & dulled my beautiful leather couch when all I was looking for was clean & shine! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Marie Di Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I have a white leather couch that I was ready to throw out because it looked so dirty and dingy. It brought it back to life and really does look brand new. Didn’t take much effort to clean. It looks way better in person. The photo doesn’t do it any justice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my two leather loveseats and my husband used it in his truck that had leather seats. The truck seats were dirty when he got the truck used, but this cleaner did the job. We both use the conditioner by the same company after we've cleaned the leather.
customer_reviews.author: lulabell5678

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but the bottle doesn't have a secure foil top to it. As such, living in the desert with high heat, I received the bottle with some of the lotion leaking out the top. If it weren't for this, I'd have given it 5-Stars. To get the most (quality & quantity) out of this dilute as described on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: We bought my daughters car used and the grey leather was very dirty. This stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the leather seats of my Cadillac CTS, My wife's Ford Flex and my daughters PT Cruiser. Mine and my wife's cars have been kept clean and new looking with this product. We bought my daughters car used and the grey leather was very dirty. This stuff, some shop towels and elbow grease got those seats looking nearly new. Not too shabby for a 15 year old car that I'm pretty sure nobody cared for the leather in. The leather in mine and my wife's cars are dyed black from the factory and neither one has faded at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Its a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remove seam stains from seat covers I removed. Skeptical as everything else I tried wouldn't work. WOW did this product deliver! Not only did it remove the seam stains, it also restored the seats to a new condition! It removed the light "blue jeans"marks and natural darkening too. No kidding, this stuff really works and does what is says it will do. Buy with confidence! Remember its for suede and leather and not for pleather.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is magic! I wish I had done this earlier!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I had no idea how dry and damaged my leather chairs were! The chair on the left is is one untreated and the chair in the left was after treatment. You can see the dryness and scratch marks on the chair on the left. After treatment, the chairs look so rich and lustrous.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle W.

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: The product is wonderful, it is so concentrated that you only have to mix a little with water and clean. It only took a cupful of the Honey and water mix and that cleaned our couch and loveseat and made them look new. My brother shined all of his leather shoes making them look new again too.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Job well done, works as advertised. Just note that you may have to go over the persistent stains a few times. With three kids I had to give this a try, my little beasts had turned my cream-colored couch into a multicolored monstrosity. From pen, marker, chocolate stains to iodine spills this puppy cleaned it all. If you see some stains not going away right away give it some time and try it in a few hours, spray the spot and leave it.
customer_reviews.author: Pirumyan

customer_reviews.title: The best cleaner I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent and easy to use. I took my white 1+ year old sneakers, cleaned them up and they look fabulous. I wish I had taken a before and after photo. I will next time. I just ordered the conditioner and can’t wait to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Strong ammonia smell though. It didn’t really get rid of this ink stain on my leather computer case but it did fade it significantly and it didn’t damage the leather so it’s just an strong okay for me.
customer_reviews.author: Young Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great leather cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This leather cleaner was delivered on time with great packaging. Great leather cleaner - wiped down a full leather couch and chair with ottoman. All traces of dirt/fingerprints, etc gone. Smelled wonderful too. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Made cracked and dried leather chair look like new.
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully on our 10 year old leather chair. The leather was cracked and dry. I used this product as instructed and the leather is almost like new. I put it on pretty thick and really let it sit because the leather was so dry to start. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned doesn't do dramatic look change
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a leather chair & a vinyl chair I don't really see a bright/restore difference but the rag had some dirt spots on it. I do notice though that I can smell the leather smell again which had gone from daily use & sleeping in it. So undoubtedly im guessing it did remove probably skin sweat & cells of daily usage because the smell of leather is back. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my tan leather seats great!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the mixing instructions provided and this has worked great on my tan leather seats in my car! I was very impressed with how clean they looked after. No strong scent and works well. It will last a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best leather seat cleaner I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading the reviews. It truly is awesome stuff! My car seats looked clean when I started, but my cleaning cloth let me know they weren't. I used their leather conditioner too. Both are definitely as good as the reviews say they are!
customer_reviews.author: bdb

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Charm
customer_reviews.text: Spilled an entire jug of hummingbird nectar as it slipped out of my hands and went splashing on my kitchen floor . I was wearing my favorite leather sandals. I was so upset. Water and sugar, just what you want everywhere! Took many attempts to get my floor clean. Tried a little warm water on my sandals and let them dry. Still spotty. Ordered Leather Honey. Followed the directions carefully, let them completely dry and I was thrilled. All the spots are gone and my favorite sandals are wearable. Just ordered the Leather Honey conditioner. My favorite sandals will love it I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene V. Verge

customer_reviews.title: By far, the BEST leather cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the cleaner and the conditioner for my large leather reclining couch and a recliner chair. I have used MANY cleaners for these pieces because we have 3 little dogs who love to play and lay on the couch...and 3 adults who like to live, eat and breathe on the furniture. I have spent much time and lots of energy to clean them! I was prepared to once again spend lots of time and elbow grease when I used this product...but to my huge and pleasant surprise, it was SUPER EASY!!! The application to the furniture was unbelievably easy and the thoroughness of the cleaning really surprised me. I totally recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: The best for car seats and so much more
customer_reviews.text: Used this stuff for years on car interiors, high end leather bags, belts, shoes, boots, jackets and more. Deep moisturizes leather and makes it soft and supple. May slightly darken light colors. Just get it, you won’t be sorry. I always let it sit overnight before wiping it down.
customer_reviews.author: Living Luxe

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to buy a leather conditioner too
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to buy a leather conditioner along with this product, I noticed that my leather was dried out after cleaning. That being said, it was able to get difficult stains out of my leather that I have been struggling with for some time. Because you combine this cleaner with water, one bottle can actually clean tons of leather goods.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Leather Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: It's a gentle cleanser that gets the toughest grime out of your leather. It's not easy to use since you have to mix it and apply it in separate steps. Im not convinced it's better than other cleansers out there. Don't forget to spot check it! It WILL stain if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: DocHDL

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Little bottle goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected, and only need to create a small batch to clean several leather chairs, sofa etc I made way too much my first batch (now I know) Smell is pretty neutral and does a nice job cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Strongman

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery service but great item
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that I had to go and get the item and I deducted a star but the overall for this item is great it does wonder to older furniture and make them look new.
customer_reviews.author: Chilies

customer_reviews.title: Follow the mixing instructions, take your time doing a small section at a time.
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat skeptical about how well the cleaner would work due to the instructions being only 1oz cleaner to 8oz water. Was I impressed! My car is a Jaguar XJ8 which has a large interior with cream-colored leather on all surfaces. I mixed only 1.5 ounces to 12 ounces water. This proved just the right amount. Moreover, my interior absolutely looks as close to new as possible! By the way, my car is a 2005. Followed up with the Leather Honey conditioner. This will be my go-to leather treatment from now on. Great products. Well done Leather Honey!! Roger
customer_reviews.author: roger vadenais

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Product ineffective for my use. Tried to clean hair oil stain for a high end leather reclining chair. Had no effect after many attempts. Product was easy enough to use but had no visible results
customer_reviews.author: Richard Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Supple Texture Restored
customer_reviews.text: My son's coworker had given him a sword for his sword collection, no information on provenance. The scabbard was dull looking looking and had ugly white rub marks that wouldn't come off until I used Leather Honey Leather Cleaner. I followed up with Leather Honey Leather Conditioner. Now the scabbard has a rich glow, the leather is supple, and looks beautiful holding the sword on the display plaque we built for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Followed directions, used Leather Honey cleaner followed by the Leather Honey Conditioner. In this case I did let it set overnight. Wiped off any excess in the morning which left a soft, no greasy residue, great look and feel to my leather car seats. Definitely recommended. Next up, family room leather couches.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Mazon

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for shoes and couches, WOW! The bowl is filthy afterward. It’s amazing how much dirt builds up that I can’t see. I have dark couches and I have dogs. Great product, smells great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: bwilson

customer_reviews.title: Leather Cleaner by Leather Honey vs Tanners Leather Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Both products cleaned most dirt and marks from the leather and vinyl. Neither product had a discernible odor to me. Both products worked best when applied to an old cotton sock then scrubbing the area. I wiped up any excess Cleaner with a dry cotton cloth. Overall, both of these products worked and appeared to be equal in performance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Olson

customer_reviews.title: 4oz NOT 32oz
customer_reviews.text: I was taken back on the tiny bottle! For $15, I was expecting to see a 32oz bottle. Rule of thumb: Read the description careful when purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: It's complicated
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok. Not greasy Ordered with the cleaner, but for some reason amazon wouldn't send the cleaner, so cannot use this product until I can clean the interior of a 1966 car :(
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Mizel

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: this stuff cleaned my purchased used and I've had them for 4 years white leather sofa, loveseat and chair. It was embarrassing how dirty they'd gotten. It took a good deal of elbow grease, but it did clean them when nothing else would. Pricey, but actually worth it. The conditioner also was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS ITEM FOR MY NEW Leather jackets 3 of them. I Have used the product on black leather Jacket and Brown Leather Jacket both Lamb skin. Still wait on my grey Leather Jacket that will be here Saturday cow hide. So far a great product
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Check out my review for the conditioner as well
customer_reviews.text: The photo is after using the conditioner but I figured I would add some photos and deets here too. The cleaner is super easy to use. Make sure you condition it right away though so you don't get additional stains in between the two processes. FYI, One 4oz bottle will clean this sofa that seats 10 to 12 people comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Counsellor

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to expectation
customer_reviews.text: Had such high hopes. Read reviews on several websites. Wasn't looking to restore my furniture, just clean them up. Didn't even do that. I've purchased cheap store brands that worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had taken a before picture for comparison. The product worked amazingly! I am extremely happy with the results and am looking forward to applying the conditioner once I re-install my door panels. Fantastic product! For the record, this is the only review I have ever posted because I like the product and family run businesses.
customer_reviews.author: The Stig

customer_reviews.title: American Made Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the reviews and they were correct . Leather honey my leather furniture really come alive this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging leather furniture!
customer_reviews.text: We have Thomasville leather couches we purchased in 2005 that needed some TLC. I have cleaned them regularly over the years, but they were starting to show their age. I read the reviews on this product (and the conditioner) and thought I’d give them a try. I am really impressed! The cleaner did a great job and seemed to remove more grime than the other cleaner I have been using for years. I am very pleased and will continue using this product!
customer_reviews.author: StanFam

customer_reviews.title: Turned old neglected leather chair into a nice piece of furnture
customer_reviews.text: I used Leather Honey conditioner on a chair that had been abandoned in a farmhouse for ten years. Following instructions on the bottle, I wiped down the cushion with a damp cloth and let it dry. Then I applied small amounts of Honey Leather conditioner with a cloth. It was amazing! I also used it on a vintage black Coach bag and was happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: kristyh

customer_reviews.title: Natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Leather honey products are what products should be modeled after. All-natural ingredients, safe to use without the harsh chemicals and affective. Bravo Leather Honey! And thank you for your existence. Your products will be the only cleaner and conditioner I will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jose J.

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this cleaner!!! I have cream colored leather seats in my new car, and my dog stepped in some sort of automotive grease and then leaped into the car! I had oily, blackish dog prints on my seats and expected they were ruined. I ordered this after reading other reviews, hoping it would at least lighten the stains, but much to my surprise it COMPLETELY removed every last trace!! I can't believe how wonderfully this worked!!
customer_reviews.author: tarcher61

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to remove buildup from leather chair.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to remove black buildup on a red leather chair. It took a lot of rubbing with a cloth soaked in the diluted cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner worked very well on my car seats. They had not been cleaned in 12 years. I used a spray bottle and a micro fiber cloth to apply it with and it was quite easy. The seats cleaned up nicely and I followed it up with the conditioner which also worked very well. Ease of use and results both get an A+ from me.
customer_reviews.author: Debra & Jack K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use - I wish it cleaned as well
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good leather cleaner for car seats. I find it ridiculous that I am asked to give ratings on spreading and thickness, but not cleaning. I am trying to clean leather, not make a peanut butter sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Francis rushford

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner made the leather on our golf cart so soft! This is a great product! Can't wait to use it on our leather couches
customer_reviews.author: Debra B.

customer_reviews.title: Leather care that works
customer_reviews.text: Following the directions...use the cleaner first, let the leather dry, and then apply the conditioner. It is sticky at first but when it dries, it leaves a nice finish and seems to keep the leather supple. We used this on leather chairs. You need to put drop clothes down so that the cleaner and conditioner doesn't get on your floor. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: spruce tree

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! My husband's hands were always dirty with newspaper ink. His leather chair was filthy. Nothing was cleaning it until I bought and used this Leather Honey! Used the cloth they sell and the chair looks brand new. Just ordered the conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Currens

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used the Leather Cleaner on my childhood English Saddle that had not only sat in a Texas attic for 20+ years but also went thru the flood waters of Hurricane Harvey, then sat in my Las Vegas, NV garage for the past year. I recently bought the cleaner and conditioner (have not used the conditioner) and the saddle looks fantastic from one quick cleaning. I plan to clean it again, as I need to remove the stirrups to really clean the straps..
customer_reviews.author: CatMom

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the leather seats in my 2006 ford pickup and they came clean and the leather honey made them shine.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: excellent product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product when used with Leather Honey conditioner. My husband used it on a 17 year old Ekhorne stressless recliner and ottoman that we were going to get rid of because of its faded and worn appearance. The results were beyond expectation since we have used many products on this recliner in the past with dismal results. We are keeping the recliner and have used it on other recliners in our house. MANY MANY THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner! I have a 10 year old leather sectional that has weathered 3 dogs, grandkids and several Super Bowl parties. I tried this product and am amazed at how well it worked. My sectional looks brand new! I love this product and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: DIANA SICKLES

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have a very light grey leather sectional and I'm sending it to consignment in a week. Out of nowhere (really, I have no idea how this happened, but I blame my husband, who blames the dog.) a very dark denim two inch wide by about 4 inches long line shows up. I used the products I had on hand for other leather cleaning, shoes, bags, etc. which didn't do a thing to lift the stains. I ordered this product and worked on the stain for a bit. My couch looks new again and there is no evidence of the blue streak!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Simms

product_meta.title: Leather Cleaner by Leather Honey: The Best Leather Cleaner for Vinyl and Leather Apparel, Furniture, Auto Interior, Shoes and Accessories. Concentrated Formula Makes 32 Ounces When Diluted!
feature_bullets: NON-TOXIC, GENTLE LEATHER CLEANER: Our leather cleaner concentrate is a natural cleaner ideal for all your leather goods. Our proven restoration formula is powerful, odorless, and chemical-free. This concentrate offers great value and makes 32 ounces when diluted with water!

CLEAN ALL YOUR LEATHER - EVEN FAUX/VINYL: Quickly and gently removes dirt, oil, tough stains and grime from car seats, truck seats, upholstery, furniture, handbags, purses, shoes, jackets, accessories, holsters, work gloves, motorcycle gear, saddles, and tack. Effectively cleans new and old leather of all colors, including black leather, white leather, brown leather, red leather, and yellow leather. Safe for exotic leather as well!

A POWERFUL CLEANER IN AN EASY SOLUTION: Dilute the concentrate in 32 ounces of water and apply with a spray bottle or lint-free cloth. No need to scrub or rub — simply wipe down the dirty leather and allow it to dry. Spot test on each leather item first. Not for use on suede.

FAMILY OWNED, AMERICAN MADE, SPECIALLY FORMULATED: For over 50 years, we have specialized in making the best leather care products, including Leather Honey Leather Conditioner, the #1 best-selling leather care product on Amazon. Our small family business has millions of happy customers.
UNLIMITED 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you're not happy with any of our leather products, simply return them for a full refund of your purchase price!
